sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { // GSAP animations for home page gsap.fromTo('.hero-section', { opacity: 0, y: 50 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1, ease: 'power2.out' } ); gsap.fromTo('.hero-content h1', { opacity: 0, x: -50 }, { opacity: 1, x: 0, duration: 0.8, delay: 0.3, ease: 'power2.out' } ); gsap.fromTo('.hero-content p', { opacity: 0, x: -30 }, { opacity: 1, x: 0, duration: 0.8, delay: 0.5, ease: 'power2.out' } ); gsap.fromTo('.cta-button', { opacity: 0, scale: 0.8 }, { opacity: 1, scale: 1, duration: 0.6, delay: 0.7, ease: 'back.out(1.7)' } ); gsap.fromTo('.category-card', { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.6, delay: 0.8, stagger: 0.1, ease: 'power2.out' } ); }, []); const categories = [ { title: 'Electronics', image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61CGHv6kmWL._AC_UY218_.jpg', link: '/products?category=Electronics' }, { title: 'Fashion', image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71jeoX0rMBL._AC_UY218_.jpg', link: '/products?category=Fashion' }, { title: 'Home & Kitchen', image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81hkVjmISQL._AC_UY218_.jpg', link: '/products?category=Home & Kitchen' }, { title: 'Books', image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81YkqyaFVEL._AC_UY218_.jpg', link: '/products?category=Books' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to Amazon Clone

Discover millions of products at unbeatable prices. Shop with confidence and get fast, reliable delivery.

Start Shopping
{/* Categories Section */}

Shop by Category

{categories.map((category, index) => (

{category.title}

Shop now
))}
{/* Features Section */}

Fast Delivery

Get your orders delivered quickly with our reliable shipping network.

Secure Shopping

Shop with confidence knowing your data and purchases are protected.

Easy Returns

Hassle-free returns and exchanges for your peace of mind.

24/7 Support

Get help whenever you need it with our dedicated customer support.

{/* Prime Section */}

Try Amazon Prime

Get unlimited fast delivery, exclusive deals, and more benefits with Amazon Prime membership.

  • Free two-day delivery
  • Prime Video streaming
  • Prime Music access
  • Exclusive deals and offers
); }; export default Home;
